bibl.title: Cleopatra of Egypt. From History to Myth.
bibl.note: nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul.

Exposition présentée au British Museum. - Version anglaise, augmentée, de: Susan WALKER e Peter HIGGS (a cura di), Cleopatra regina d'Egitto (The British Museum - Fondazione Memmo) (Milano, 2000). - I. The Ptolemies and Alexandria. - II. Cleopatra, Lady of the Two Lands. - III. Cleopatra and the Power of Rome. - IV. Egypt in Rome / The Myth of Cleopatra. - Chronology. Glossary. Bibliography. Concordance. Index. - P. 180, No. 188: Peter VAN MINNEN, Royal Ordinance on papyrus of Cleopatra VII, granting tax privileges to Publius Canidius [P. Bingen 45].
WALKER Susan and Peter HIGGS (Edd.), Cleopatra of Egypt. From History to Myth.
London, British Museum Press, 2001, 4°, 384 pp., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 0-7141-1938-5 (hbk) / 0-7141-1943-1 (pbk). £40 (hbk) / 24.99 (pbk).
